author: bencomic

left.text: Is your phone number ##############? We've detected hacking signals coming from this number.

right.text: I came in here to investigate, not sure who was doing the hacking... until I saw your little Forty-Kick Iron Endurance Challenge. A cyber-felony.

left.text: I'm as serious as a heart attack.

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 40
